contents: Article 3 (Functions) The Committee performs the following functions. Revised 2017. 4. 3, 2019. 1. 31. 1. Deliberation of member sport group evaluation plan and evaluation work guidelines 2. Implementation of member sport group evaluation 3. Deliberation of member sport group evaluation results 4. Member sport group evaluation results 5. Other matters deemed necessary to achieve the purpose of establishing the committee.
